institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 21 (Support from external experts, etc.)
contents: Article 21 (Support for external experts, etc.) ① The Chairman of the Board may select and support external experts or participating organizations (hereinafter referred to as *external experts, etc.) in order to smoothly carry out the learning group activities of the applicant company., ② The Chairman of the Board may select and support external experts. Support may be provided, and performance evaluation may be conducted to improve the quality of project performance. ③ The Chairman may restrict participation in the next year's project to external experts whose performance evaluation results are significantly low.
